answers.author: Troy Brown
answers.text:
Attached is the policy implemented by the City of Livermore.  The thought process what that folks that justified having email access recieve a higher stipend for a data plan.  The stipend amounts are set a level that assumes that employees will have some personal use with their phone, and therefore the stipend only covers about 80% of actual costs.
